Artist Statement 1: Kintsugi is a Japanese craft that fixes cracked pots with a golden binder that makes it even more beautiful than before it had been broken. Do you see the hidden hand at work in the brokenness of this pot? How may God be working through your brokenness?
excerpt:
Robert was a Vietnam vet who had been in and out of jail. Now in his 45th year of age he was turning over a new leaf. 

He had heard of this unique employer who actually desired people with a volatile history like his. The CEO, Henry Price said it made for much better stories. 

After all, stories was his business. Henry Price had begun a newspaper (which was now a veritable online news source) in which they covered the news but in a new way. It was called "Whole History Daily." It was true reporting, but it followed up and featured the redeeming outcomes of current event stories.

"Whole History Daily" had grown steadily into a country-wide contender. People liked it because not only did they get to read the news, but they got to see their broken world as part of a redeemable story. It was an uplifting alternative to the depressing current events that were normally reporte...
Blog excerpt:
Righteousness is the prescription given by the doctor that knows us and our ailing world best.

Raw Spoon, 6-27-18
